snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio said that his decision to check on the status of Bishop Orlando Findlayter, a key political ally, was “absolutely appropriate.”
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio defends his decision to call a top police official to inquire about arrest of Bishop Orlando Findlayter, key political supporter.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio said that his decision to check on the status of Bishop Orlando Findlayter, a key political ally, was “absolutely appropriate.”

headline.main: De Blasio Defends Call to Police About Supporter’s Arrest
headline.print_headline: De Blasio Defends Call About Pastor’s Arrest
